definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: He turned his toes out like Chaplin.
sentences.chinese: 他像卓别林那样把脚尖向外撇。

sentences.english: Happiness would rise from the bottom of your heart when you're enjoying the hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 泡在阿尔山的温泉里，幸福则会从心底向外发散。

sentences.english: He who looks outside dreams, he who looks inside awakens.
sentences.chinese: 向外瞅的人在梦中，向内看的人苏醒灭。

sentences.english: External layers of the star are forced outwards, drifting through space for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 恒星的外层被迫向外扩张，在太空中漂移数千年。

sentences.english: It seeks for resonance from macrocosm.
sentences.chinese: 向外，向整个大宇宙去寻求共鸣。

sentences.english: The dress floats out to an extravagant drift of yardage at the hem.
sentences.chinese: 这种衣服在折边处有以码计的多余部分向外飘摆着。

sentences.english: Roman provinces were the historical product of the large-scaled Roman expansion.
sentences.chinese: 罗马行省是罗马大规模向外扩张的历史产物。

sentences.english: A Decken's sifaka peers out from a jagged stone maw.
sentences.chinese: 从一处锯齿状的石头缺口处向外窥视。

sentences.english: He dragged the child outside by main force.
sentences.chinese: 他生拉硬拽地将孩子向外拖。

sentences.english: I threw it across the kitchen , and it landed in the fridge .
sentences.chinese: 我沿着厨房向外扔，它落进了冰箱里。

sentences.english: Steel beams radiated outward from the core, supporting the floors and attaching to the exterior columns.
sentences.chinese: 钢梁自钢芯向外伸出，支撑地板以及连接外部的钢柱。

sentences.english: The outflows can thrash about, forming curved jets.
sentences.chinese: 向外流出的物质会强力搅动，形成曲状喷流。

sentences.english: White's office is located on the road, a number of well- head water fountain outside.
sentences.chinese: 办公楼所在的白龙路上，多处地下水井口向外喷水。

sentences.english: Give thanks to God so that you may extend this love ever outward in a widening circle of gladness.
sentences.chinese: 向主献上你的感恩而将这份爱像快乐的涟漪向外扩展。

sentences.english: Tiptoe to outside rotation, heel to close within.
sentences.chinese: 脚尖向外转动，脚跟向内靠紧。

sentences.english: Then the hen peeps out from under her wing.
sentences.chinese: 然后母鸡躲在自己翅膀底下向外偷看。

definition: upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
toward/to face/to open onto/to turn towards/orientation/exposure/Qibla (Islam)
to incline/to lean/to slant/to slope/to tilt
